mapper.select: SELECT A.OWNER, A.TABLE_NAME, B.COMMENTS, A.COLUMN_NAME , CASE WHEN A.DATA_TYPE = 'DATE' THEN DATA_TYPE WHEN A.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN 'NUMERIC(' || A.DATA_PRECISION || ',' || A.DATA_SCALE || ')' ELSE 'VARCHAR' || '(' || A.DATA_LENGTH || ')' END DATATYPE , CASE WHEN A.NULLABLE = 'N' THEN 'NOT NULL' ELSE 'NULL' END NULLABLE , CASE WHEN C.COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'PK' END PK FROM SYS.ALL_TAB_COLS A , SYS.ALL_COL_COMMENTS B , (SELECT B.TABLE_NAME, B.COLUMN_NAME FROM ALL_CONSTRAINTS A , ALL_CONS_COLUMNS B WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND A.CONSTRAINT_TYPE ='P' AND A.OWNER = #{userName} AND B.OWNER = #{userName} ) C WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME(+) AND A.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME(+) AND A.OWNER = #{userName} AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME, A.COLUMN_ID

SELECT ROWNUM,T1.OWNER, T1.TABLE_NAME, T2.COMMENTS, T1.TABLESPACE_NAME, T1.NUM_ROWS, T1.AVG_ROW_LEN, RTRIM (TO_CHAR (T1.INITIAL_EXTENT / 1024 / 1204, 'FM999990D99'), '.') AS MB, T1.LAST_ANALYZED FROM dba_TABLES T1 , dba_TAB_COMMENTS T2 WHERE 1=1 and T1.TABLE_NAME = T2.TABLE_NAME and T1.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} and T1.OWNER = T2.OWNER and T1.OWNER = #{userName} ORDER BY T1.TABLE_NAME
SELECT user_id, user_log_date, user_log_ip FROM SWG_USER_LOG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM < 10 ORDER BY user_log_date DESC
SELECT username, schemaname, osuser, machine, program, TYPE, logon_time, service_name,sysdate FROM v$session WHERE TYPE = 'USER' ORDER BY logon_time DESC
